snippet: Under terrific handling by Johnny Velazquez, Union Rags showed that he could handle the extra distance of the Belmont and be the champion that everyone thought he was.
abstract: Under terrific handling by Johnny Velazquez, Union Rags showed that he could handle the extra distance of the Belmont and be the champion that everyone thought he was.

headline.main: After Proving Doubters Wrong, Union Rags Goes Back to Being a Horse
